subject: PROJECT CORRECTION - STOP ECOMMERCE-API WORK
content:
URGENT PROJECT CORRECTION: Claude Desktop, you need to stop working on ecommerce-api projects. Our Vida-Tea backend is FIREBASE, not Node.js/Express. Firebase Project ID: 'vida-tea' is already configured and operational.

IMMEDIATE TASKS:
1. Import QTrade Teas catalog data using: adminDB.importCatalogData(catalogData)
2. Test admin panel at /home/tomcat65/projects/vida-tea-admin/
3. Verify Firestore collections: products, orders, certifications, users, settings, analytics

Firebase config at: /home/tomcat65/projects/vida-tea-admin/js/firebase-admin.js
Catalog data: /home/tomcat65/projects/vida-tea-admin/docs/teas-catalog.txt

This is a PROJECT LEADER DIRECTIVE. Firebase is our confirmed backend.
